hook.text: Try multiplying 47 by 23 in your head. That strain you feel? That's working memory at capacity.

discovery.text: It has a strict capacity of about 4 items and drains quickly under cognitive load.

twist.text: Working memory capacity is one of the best predictors of academic success across all subjects.

climax.text: Reducing extraneous loadâ€”clean slides, clear instructionsâ€”frees working memory for actual learning.

punchline.text: The less your brain juggles, the more it learns.

quiz.question: Why is reducing cognitive load important for learning?
options: It frees limited working memory capacity for processing actual learning content
It makes students feel more relaxed
It allows the teacher to cover more material
